item.description:
let's meetup at johnny d's in somerville at 9:45 pm on friday night, 17 april, to see The Chicken Slacks, a great soul, funk, and r&b band.

a Chicken Slacks show is always a great time as they'll get you moving, not only with their rousing covers of songs we all know, but also with great songs you never heard of as well as their own original material.

for more on the band, check out The Chicken Slacks web site: http://www.chickensla...

also check out this review of their latest cd: http://www.thenoise-b...

details:

the cover charge for this show is $10.

if you come to the show, please text or call me to find me, preferably text. i do wander around and look for folks (so it really helps if you posted a good picture of yourself), but texting me is the way to find me.

if you're driving to the show, note that there are street parking spots, but they may be difficult to find. johnny d's has a good city parking map here: http://www.johnnyds.c...

if you're taking the T, the Davis Square Red Line stop is directly across the street from johnny d's.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll email a cell # to anyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 7 pm 17 April
item.name: Chicken Slacks @ Johnny D's
